授業方法:
Various methods including, pair and group work, listening exercises, dialog construction and presentation.
Each class will consist of various speaking and listening skills, pair work and group activities. Creating and writing theme-based dialogs and presenting them will also be included.

第1回: Welcome back, summer holiday interview chart, short presentations on holiday time
第2回: Text:  Collecting Data - pair work activity, making inquiries and note taking
第3回: pair work gap information activity, listening comprehension drills, vocabulary matching
第4回: situational dialog pair work construction: ordering dinner in a restaurant and presentation
第5回: situational dialog pair work construction: buying train tickets and presentation
第6回: pair work information gap exercise, small group interview chart, listening comprehension exercises
第7回: reading: new article and comprehension, expressing opinions, supporting thoughts
第8回: What is one reason why ...?  pair work activity, situational dialog construction and presentation: class schedule
第9回: pair work information gap exercise, listening comprehension drills, find the word that does not belong activity
第10回: cultural and geographical questions, group interview chart, making probable predictions
第11回: "If the world were 1000 people" article and opinions presented
第12回: vocabulary build up, usage and pitfalls, listening comprehension activities, finish the sentence
第13回: course review, exam explanation, question and answer session
トピック.授業外学習2: Students would be advised to do as much personal study outside the classroom as possible.  Also, to submit any homework assignments on time.
